document_data.name: Drufi
document_data.mainbody: '''Drufi''' ({{Pronounce|DROO|fee|refs=}}) was a [[frost giant]] who led an attack on [[Bryn Shander]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Drufi always traveled with her two [[winter wolf|winter wolves]].
document_data.History:
In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], under the orders of [[Jarl]] [[Storvald]], Drufi led a giant contingent to Bryn Shander to search for [[Artus Cimber]] and the ''[[Ring of Winter]]''.

Around that same time, Drufi led a search party of twenty frost giants to [[Chult]] to continue searching for Artus Cimber and the ''Ring of Winter''. The giants arrived aboard the [[longship]] ''[[Hvalspyd]]''. Drufi's search was slow and inefficient as she needed to avoid detection by the [[Flaming Fist]]s.
